decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the submitted application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

Prior to the installation of any of the rooflights hereby approved, details of how the glazing will be tinted so as to minimise light spill shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval in writing. Any film used to achieve the requisite tinting shall be non-perishable, taper-proof, and shall be replaced immediately in the event that it ceases to achieve the approved effect.  The rooflights shall be installed and thereafter maintained in accordance with the approved details, unless otherwise first agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To ensure satisfactory living conditions for neighbouring occupiers, to minimise light spill to the area which could harm its verdant character and to minimise impact on wildlife, in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012
description: Conversion of garage into habitable space, installation of 10 nos side rooflights and removal of chimney. Replacement of doors and windows, erection of gate.
